roleset.name: transform
roleset.note: ALTER-V NOTES: Verbnet entries other_cos-45.4 turn-26.6.1, other framed members include decrease, halt, narrow, shut, slow, sweeten, weaken; convert. Comparison to 'change'. (from alter.01-v)

roles.note: I actually doubt start and end points will occur, but there they are anyway. (from alter.01-v)

example.name: just transitive
example.text: But although the golden share has been waived, [a hostile bidder for Jaguar]-1 would still have *trace*-1 to alter the British concern's articles of association which ban shareholdings of more than 15%.
example.arg: the British concern's articles of association which ban shareholdings of more than 15%

example.name: ARG3 and ARG2
example.text: In one instance you state that [a bill]-1 was altered *trace*-1 from $600 to $1,256, and that $600 was the proper amount A.

example.name: Arg0,1
example.text: His alteration of the will is invalid but what effect does it have?
